tool_description: This project created for serve api endpoints to encrypt and decrypt text via http request
name: secure-text-api
title: secure-text-api

api_list.name: getKey
api_list.description:
This endpoint will generated publickey and privatekey.
It response **msgCode** as six character string.

Client can use this code to verify owner of key, 
when calling encrypt and decrypt endpoint.

*** After decrypt ciphertext this code will inactive, 
client need to call getKey again to get new code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://secure-text-api.p.rapidapi.com/getKey"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "secure-text-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://secure-text-api.p.rapidapi.com/getKey"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "secure-text-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
